|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "EWW604-B1-L5 REV:205 (XC)" is silkscreened on the board in the photos. :[http://www.cybertan.com.tw/Products/EWW604.html ''CyberTAN'' EWW604 manuf.] "EWW604-B1-L5 REV:305 (XD)" is silkscreened on one newer revision unit. Newer revision units omit a populated serial header and likely have newer firmware (which locks out flashing third-party firmware), necessitating flashing via manual TFTP in U-Boot (see [http://mrjcd.com/EA8500_DD-WRT/ here]). According to the [https://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=156231 ''Product comparison chart of the EA7500, EA8500, E8350 and E8400''] :from Linksys, the E8500 supports wireless bridge and wireless repeater modes. {{WiFiCert|WFA59270|04/14/2015}} {{see also|CyberTAN|Linksys EA7300}} {{FCC ST|10/06/2015|indexme.}} ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32711-linksys-ea8500-max-stream-ac2600-mu-mimo-smart-wi-fi-router-reviewed-part-1 ''Linksys EA8500 Max-Stream AC2600 MU-MIMO Smart Wi-Fi Router
Reviewed - Part 1'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-ea8500-max-stream-ac2600-mu-mimo-smart-wi-fi-router-reviewed.24214/ ''Linksys EA8500'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = https://wiki.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_EA8500 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ea8500- build 28846 20160116 |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_ea8500 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/ea8500 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=310426 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq806x |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a15_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== [[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[ASRock G10]] *[[Linksys E8350]] *[[Linksys EA9200]] *[[Netgear R7500]] *[[Netgear R7500v2]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
